summary: The family and friends of two children lost in the wilderness mount a desperate search to find them.
cast: Howard Keel|Jane Greer|Patricia Medina|Keenan Wynn|Robert Burton|Lee Aaker|Linda Lowell|Michael Dugan|Elaine Stewart|Jonathan Cott|Jeff Richards|Dick Simmons|Gill Dennis|Dan Ferniel|Bob Whitney
director: Director: Joseph H. Lewis (as Joseph Lewis)
title: Desperate Search
